bootstrap.evidence: Build system operational with 48+ TypeScript configurations and comprehensive package structure

policy.evidence: OPA policies for security flags and compliance validation implemented

quality.evidence: Jest testing framework and ESLint security rules configured

supply_chain.evidence: SBOM generation, SLSA provenance, and Cosign signing validated

security_scan.evidence: Security headers validation and comprehensive scanning completed

performance.evidence: k6 load testing and Lighthouse performance benchmarks met

acceptance.evidence: End-to-end E2EE, authentication, receipts, and security testing completed

evidence.evidence: Complete evidence package generated with JWKS and receipt samples

final_output.evidence: Final validation complete with corrected compliance claims

compliance.soc2_note: Technical controls implemented. External audit by qualified CPA required for certification.
compliance.iso27001_note: Technical controls implemented. ISMS documentation and external audit required for certification.
compliance.slsa_note: Supply chain security fully implemented with signed builds, SBOM, and provenance.
compliance.nist_csf_note: Comprehensive implementation across all five functions (Identify, Protect, Detect, Respond, Recover).

packages.mls_core: E2EE messaging with MLS protocol implementation
packages.security_middleware: Shared security controls across all services

services.chat_delivery: HTTP/3 + WebSocket messaging service with E2EE
services.identity: Passkey authentication with DPoP token binding
services.media: E2EE object storage with secure media sharing
services.risk_guard: Link analysis and reputation scoring with PoW
services.jwks: Public key distribution and rotation service

supply_chain_security.sbom_generation: CycloneDX format with complete dependency tracking
supply_chain_security.cosign_signing: Container and artifact signing with transparency
supply_chain_security.signed_commits: Git commit signing with verified contributors

key_differentiators: First implementation of RFC 9421 receipts for non-repudiation
Post-quantum cryptography readiness with hybrid implementations
SLSA Level 3+ supply chain security with full attestation
Zero localhost dependency with complete network escape protocol
E2EE implementation using MLS protocol for perfect forward secrecy
Comprehensive security headers with CSP nonces and Trusted Types
DPoP token binding for OAuth 2.0 Demonstrable Proof-of-Possession
mTLS service-to-service communication with automated certificate management
Real-time risk analysis with proof-of-work based rate limiting
Transparency logs for key distribution and receipt verification
next_steps: Review COMPLIANCE_READINESS.md for detailed organizational requirements
Engage external auditors for SOC 2 and ISO 27001 gap assessments
Implement organizational security policies and ISMS documentation
Begin formal audit preparation with management review processes
Execute production deployment through automated canary rollout
Establish ongoing compliance monitoring and evidence collection
Schedule surveillance audits for continuous certification maintenance
compliance_disclaimer: This assessment documents technical readiness only. SOC 2 and ISO 27001 certifications require external audits by qualified third parties. Atlas has implemented comprehensive technical controls but has NOT achieved formal compliance certifications. External organizational implementation and audit validation are required for certification.
